explains: n. 环境保护主义者，环境保护论者；环境艺术家

sentences.en: The royal environmentalist has been promoting radical ideas for most of his adult life.
sentences.cn: 这位王室环保主义者在成年后的大部分时间里一直在宣扬激进的理念。

sentences.en: As America's first environmentalist, John Muir lived his life forever daring to undertake new adventures.
sentences.cn: 作为美国第一位环保主义者，约翰·缪尔一生都敢于冒险。

sentences.en: For the past ten years, the environmentalist has been delivering speeches about environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 在过去的十年中，这位环保主义者一直在发表关于环境保护的演讲。
